scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=test && gulp run && pm2 start ecosystem.linux.config.js --env test
scripts.release: set NODE_ENV=release  && gulp run && pm2 start ecosystem.linux.config.js --env release
scripts.build: set NODE_ENV=production  && gulp run && pm2 start ecosystem.linux.config.js --env production
scripts.unstart: set NODE_ENV=test && pm2 start ecosystem.linux.config.js --env test && gulp run --un  && gulp watch --un
scripts.untest: set NODE_ENV=test && gulp run --un && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env test
scripts.unbuild: set NODE_ENV=production && gulp run --un && pm2 start ecosystem.linux.config.js --env production
scripts.unrelease: set NODE_ENV=release  && gulp run --un && pm2 start ecosystem.linux.config.js --env release
scripts.testwin: set NODE_ENV=test && gulp run && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env test
scripts.releasewin: set NODE_ENV=release  && gulp run && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js  --env release
scripts.buildwin: set NODE_ENV=production  && gulp run && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
